text: Toto the Hero () is a 1991 Belgian French German fantasy comedy drama movie directed by first time director Jaco Van Dormael. It stars Michel Bouquet, Jo De Backer, Thomas Godet, Gisela Uhlen, Mireille Perrier, Sandrine Blancke, Michel Robin, Pascal Duquenne, Jo Deseure. ==Other websites== * *TOTO LES HEROS at Cannes Film Festival Category:1991 fantasy movies Category:1991 comedy-drama movies Category:Belgian comedy movies Category:Belgian drama movies Category:Belgian fantasy movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French drama movies Category:French fantasy movies Category:German comedy movies Category:German drama movies Category:German fantasy movies Category:Movies directed by Jaco Van Dormael
title: Toto the Hero
